wf.serialDocumentReview.pleaseSelect: Please select some participants for the review.
wf.serialDocumentReview.AcceptReject: Please accept or reject the document.
wf.serialDocumentReview.updateRequest.di: The document was refused. Please update it before going back to the validation flow, or cancel the review.
wf.parallelDocumentReview.chooseParticip: Please select some participants for the review.
wf.parallelDocumentReview.give_opinion.d: Please give your opinion. Click on N/A if you have no advice.
wf.parallelDocumentReview.consolidate.di: Please validate or reject the document in regard to the review history.
label.dublincore.author.info: The author is filled automatically when creating the document.
label.dublincore.contributors.info: Contributors are filled automatically when creating or editing the document.
label.dublincore.lastContributor.info: Last contributor is filled automatically when creating or editing the document.
label.dublincore.subjects.info: This property is used by virtual navigation.
label.dublincore.coverage.info: This property is used by virtual navigation.
label.editComment.tooltip: This comment will be visible in the logs displayed in the "History" tab.
label.versioning.changeVersion.tooltip: If a new version is created, the new archived version will hold the values presented in this form.
